TopicTitle: Empty Hydrogen Tanks Splashing Down bounce like superballs

Articles.Content: I splashed down a refueling vessel last night that contained a 20ton hydrogen tank.  When it hit the water it repeatedly bounced dozens of meters back into the air. I think it's boyancy is WAY too high.

3 hours ago, WingC3 said:

I splashed down a refueling vessel last night that contained a 20ton hydrogen tank.  When it hit the water it repeatedly bounced dozens of meters back into the air. I think it's boyancy is WAY too high.

Pretty much anything that touches the water does that at the moment.  I discovered that when I crashed a plane into the water.  I reckon the water is a project for a later patch.
